hoi polloi

Join hoi polloi and help create a local community orchard in Harrow right from your own garden! Our aim is to harvest and maintain fruit trees in Harrow to develop a sustainable community which can share local fruit to produce healthy food. Have you an excess or abundance of fruit? We can harvest your fruit trees and distribute the produce. Would you like fruit for producing jams, pickles and pies... even apple juice! We can provide the harvest for you – in season. If you would you like to know more about the hoi polloi community orchard, please visit our website.

Website: http://www.hoipolloi.btck.co.uk
